messages.content: Don't make assumptions about what values to plug into functions. Ask for clarification if a user request is ambiguous.
What's the temperature in Grand Canyon in Fahrenheit

Could you clarify what you’re looking for?  
• Are you asking for the current (real-time) temperature at the Grand Canyon?  
• Or would you like typical temperature ranges for a specific month or season (e.g., average highs and lows in July)?

I’m sorry, but I don’t have a way to fetch live weather data. For the up-to-the-minute temperature at the Grand Canyon, please check a reliable weather service (e.g., the National Weather Service, Weather.com, or a weather app on your phone).
Can you use a tool to check it?

I’m afraid none of my available tools provide live weather data, so I still can’t look up the current temperature for you. To see the real-time temperature at the Grand Canyon, please check a dedicated weather source such as:

• National Weather Service (weather.gov)  
• Weather.com (The Weather Channel)  
• Your preferred weather or mapping app (e.g., Apple Weather, Google Weather)

Those services pull data directly from weather stations and satellites and can give you the exact current reading.
